definition: water source/water supply/headwaters of a river
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Yet fights over water have also led to dialogue.
sentences.chinese: 不过，争夺水源的战斗也导致了对话。

sentences.english: Grumeti River is the only source of water on their long and tough journey.
sentences.chinese: 在这艰辛的长途跋涉中，格鲁美地河是唯一的水源。

sentences.english: The p paddocks will need water.
Water to the Soviet Union in the region south of the water culture in an awkward position.
sentences.chinese: 江南的多水也使苏中地区的水源文化处于尴尬的境地。

sentences.english: The first are the large factories in residential areas or close to water sources.
sentences.chinese: 第一个就是处在居民区或者邻近水源的大工厂。

sentences.english: Girls enjoy the clean water from the new water points in Tianfala.
sentences.chinese: 姜法拉的一个新取水点，女孩们正在享用清洁的水源。

sentences.english: They used to give us light in the night and water.
sentences.chinese: 它们曾经在夜晚给予我们光亮和水源。

sentences.english: Among those options is the development of new water resources such as brackish water.
sentences.chinese: 在那些选择之中是新水源的发展譬如微咸的水。

sentences.english: Our country is well watered by rivers and brooks.
sentences.chinese: 国因河溪多而水源充足。
停电，水源枯竭，油价上窜。

sentences.english: He divined water on my farm.
sentences.chinese: 他用卜杖在我的农场中探测水源。

sentences.english: is sending water and water purification supplies.
sentences.chinese: 则正在运输水和水源净化器。

sentences.english: The Upper Reaches of Minjiang River served as ecological barriers and the major water supplying area to the Chengdu Plain.
sentences.chinese: 岷江上游是成都平原的生态屏障和水源生命线。

sentences.english: To put $25 billion into perspective- it takes $15 billion to provide clean water to half a billion people in the world who need it.
sentences.chinese: 150亿美元可以为5亿人提供干净的水源。

sentences.english: Pei Tong wants to grow a plant in an area which is exposed to sunlight but has as very little water source.
sentences.chinese: 姵彤要在一块有阳光而水源却很少的地方种一棵植物。

sentences.english: Conclusion The source water diverted from Luan River was polluted by protozoan and viruses.
sentences.chinese: 结论引滦水源已受原虫和病毒的污染。

definition: water intake/to obtain water (from a well etc)
to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
potable water (water with low salt content)/fresh water
